Pai is Love

Pai, Thailand is the self-declared love capital of Thailand, and it's easy to see why. There's something special about this tiny little mountain town that you will fall in love with too.

HI, I'M JENN

I'm a travel and lifestyle blogger, influencer, and content creator.

I caught the travel bug while backpacking through Europe on summer vacation years ago, and I've been on a mission to get lost and explore this Earth ever since.
